item.title: another banger by me
item.description: is this a blog now? anyway, right now i have nothing better to do, so i’m sharing this with you: a banger about love and maths? i should probably go to bed now, bye
item.content:
is this a blog now?
anyway, right now i have nothing better to do, so i’m sharing this with you: a banger about love and maths?
i should probably go to bed now, bye
